title: Add Live Stack Inbox for newly uploaded files

requirements.text: When a file upload completes, display the file normally in the Gallery, then immediately animate it with a 200-250ms slide animation toward a small stack positioned in the bottom-right corner of the Gallery view

quotes: Όταν ολοκληρώνεται το upload:το αρχείο εμφανίζεται κανονικά στην Gallery. Αμέσως μετά κάνει slide animation προς μια μικρή στοίβα στο κάτω δεξί μέρος gallery.

acceptanceCriteria: File appears in Gallery immediately after upload completes
File then slides to the bottom-right stack with 200-250ms duration
Animation is smooth and does not disrupt Gallery usage

requirements.text: Display the stack in the bottom-right corner of the Gallery with a subtle 3-5px diagonal offset between stacked file cards to create a layered visual effect

quotes: Η στοίβα:δείχνει ελαφρύ offset μεταξύ καρτών (3–5px διαγώνια).

acceptanceCriteria: Stack appears in the bottom-right corner of Gallery
Cards in stack have 3-5px diagonal offset between them
Visual layering is subtle and professional

requirements.text: Show a badge on the stack displaying the count of unorganized files currently in the inbox

quotes: Έχει badge με αριθμό μη οργανωμένων αρχείων.

acceptanceCriteria: Badge displays numeric count of unorganized files
Count updates in real-time as files are added or organized
Badge is clearly visible on the stack

requirements.text: Display an 'Unorganized' indicator on files in the Gallery that have not yet been moved to a Folder or Mission

quotes: Τα αρχεία παραμένουν ορατά στην Gallery αλλά έχουν ένδειξη "Μη οργανωμένο".

acceptanceCriteria: Unorganized files in Gallery show 'Unorganized' indicator
Indicator is visible but does not obstruct file preview
Organized files do not show this indicator

requirements.text: When a file is moved to a Folder or Mission, remove it from the Live Stack Inbox and remove its 'Unorganized' indicator in the Gallery

quotes: Μόλις το αρχείο μεταφερθεί σε Folder ή Mission:αφαιρείται από τη στοίβα. Φεύγει η ένδειξη "Μη οργανωμένο".

acceptanceCriteria: File removed from stack when moved to Folder
File removed from stack when moved to Mission
'Unorganized' indicator removed from Gallery view
Stack badge count decrements appropriately

requirements.text: Ensure the Live Stack Inbox does not interfere with normal Gallery usage, interactions, or navigation

quotes: Να μην εμποδίζει τη χρήση της Gallery.

acceptanceCriteria: Stack positioned to avoid blocking Gallery content
Gallery scrolling, selection, and preview actions work normally
Stack does not capture unintended touch or click events

requirements.text: Apply a professional, non-playful visual style to the Live Stack Inbox, stack animations, and unorganized indicators
acceptanceCriteria: Stack design uses professional colors and typography
Animations are smooth and subtle, not bouncy or exaggerated
Badge and indicators follow existing UI design language

constraints: Do not modify any other features or functionality of the application
Stack offset between cards must be 3-5px diagonal
Stack must be positioned in the bottom-right corner of the Gallery
Do not interfere with normal Gallery usage
nonGoals: Backend state changes for tracking organized status
Reorganizing existing Gallery layout or components
Modifying file upload logic or backend upload handling
Changing folder or mission selection flows
Adding new file management actions beyond organizing
